page.title: 06CHURCH FENTON INDUSTRY
page.content: {Triesse}is a company that buys damaged wood imported from all over the world (eg Brazil,Norway+Malasia).They repair it cut it up + resell it mainly to small kitchen and bedroom furniture manufacturers,(90% to Lancashire.) {Triesse,}in business 12 yrs, came to C.F.on 01/06/85 because the new site provides existing workshops and 11 acres of land for expansion.(existing buildings belonged to {Firth Blakeley an engineering firm now closed.) Most wood is moved by road as the sheets are too wide for trains.A pity as a line runs right into the main workshop. At present{20 men are employed}some from C.F.The owner hopes to develop the site into a{trading estate}and employ more people in the future. { Dross Ind.}recycles aluminium, sells to B.Leyland + Thorn EMI, employs 9.
